edge_1: The Academy Award-winning composer Michael Giacchino did not compose the theme music for Doctor Strange, unlike his previous works for Marvel movies such as Spider-Man: Homecoming and The Avengers.
edge_2: The composer Christophe Beck created the theme music for the Marvel superhero Doctor Strange, as seen in the movie of the same name released in 2016.
edge_3: The Ant-Man (2015) theme by Christophe Beck was used in Avengers: Endgame.
